mapper.select: SELECT SEARCHWORD,COUNT FROM (SELECT SEARCHWORD,COUNT(SEARCHWORD) AS COUNT FROM SEARCH_HISTORY WHERE SEARCHDATE >= SYSDATE-7 GROUP BY SEARCHWORD ORDER BY COUNT(SEARCHWORD) DESC) WHERE 10 >= ROWNUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEARCH_HISTORY(SEARCHSEQ, SEARCHWORD, SEARCHDATE) VALUES(SEQ_SEARCH.NEXTVAL, #{searchWord}, SYSDATE)
